title: FPS Drop
body:
Hello,
It seems that since the latest patch all of my games are getting some serious FPS drop as the game continues.  I  typically hold the cap at 144 without issue.  However, as the games continue, i get drops down as low as 60 up and down.  This appears to be new behavior as of 6.13.

Thank You
Hammer

replies.body:
You'll want to visit the article below for information on troubleshooting FPS issues; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#section-windows

It has a step that suggests updating your video driver, but if you need to do that step and it doesn't work I also suggest *rolling back* to an older driver, reinstalling the current one, and/or updating to a beta driver (if you're on the WHQL 'live' version).

If nothing helps, you'll want to make sure your CPU and GPU are not overheating, which often results in reduced performance the longer a game goes on. You'll need to find some third party software to check it, if you have none already.

If you need assistance please let me know, or submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Deep Terror Nami suggested some great starting steps. If you're still seeing issues after working through the FPS troubleshooting guide, I definitely recommend you reach out to our tech specialists by [submitting a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to dive deeper into other potential causes to this issue.

Unfortunately, nothing that simple.  It appears to be isolated to LoL.

Thanks
Hammer
